bill_title: limit transfers from a school district's general fund.
keywords: Department of Education and Cultural Affairs

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to limit transfers from a school district's general fund. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 13-16 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: No school district may transfer any sum of money from the general fund to any other fund for which there is a levy if the district is not taxing at the maximum levy allowed by law. Section 2. That chapter 13-16 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: No school district may transfer any sum of money from the general fund to any capital project fund. Section 3. That chapter 13-16 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: No school district may transfer any sum of money from the general fund to any fund for which there is a levy in an amount greater than five percent of the expenditures of that fund for the fiscal year in which the transfer is made. Section 4. That chapter 13-16 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Any violation of this Act shall result in a forfeiture from the district's entitlement pursuant to chapter 13-13 in the following fiscal year an amount equal to the amount the transfer was in excess of the total allowed by this Act. However, the secretary of education and cultural affairs may grant a waiver of this section if the school district can show unforeseeable and uncontrollable circumstances that made the transfer necessary.
